task_summary: Place the grid clamp into the grid fixture with proper alignment and then retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-type robot with a parallel gripper is operating over a wooden workbench with a SARA controller box and a set of small black clamps. The instruction is to place a grid clamp at a designated grid fixture position. The robot should approach above the fixture, align precisely, descend until contact, press lightly to seat the clamp, open the gripper to release, and retreat safely. The scene appears static and free of obstacles, with visual fiducials on the table aiding alignment.
preconditions: Grid clamp is already held in the gripper
Grid fixture target pose (goal_pose) is known or can be inferred
Workspace is clear of unexpected obstacles
Robot is homed and within reach of the fixture area
stepwise_plan: Verify the clamp is in the gripper.
Move above the grid fixture at a safe height.
Approach and align to the fixture precisely.
Lower until gentle contact is detected.
Execute a tolerant place motion at the goal pose with light press.
Open gripper to release the clamp.
Retreat upward/away to a safe distance.
success_criteria: Clamp is seated within the grid fixture at goal_pose within tolerance
End-effector clears the work area without collision
failure_and_recovery: If object not detected in gripper, abort placement and request recovery pick
If alignment fails, re-approach and realign
If contact not detected within max depth, raise and retry alignment
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the clamp is released and the robot has retreated to a safe distance.

frame_3.now_evidence: Arm is centered over fixture area suggesting immediate placement action.
frame_3.predicts_next: Release or seating expected right after alignment.

node_specs.description: Ensure the clamp is currently held before attempting placement.
Orient the tool yaw to match the fixture orientation.
Move to a safe height above the grid fixture.
Approach and align precisely to the fixture target.
Lower until gentle contact is detected for seating.
Place with tolerance and light press at the goal pose.
Back away to a safe distance after placing.

failure_modes: No contact detected within allowed depth
Clamp sticks to gripper after opening
recovery_strategy: Abort and request re-pick if clamp missing
Pulse open/close or micro-jog to detach then retry retreat
assumptions: The episode depicts a placement (object already grasped).
Goal pose key 'goal_pose' corresponds to the grid fixture cell.
Visual frames are similar across tiles; exact instant of release is inferred.

expected_success_criteria: Clamp seated flush in fixture; gripper open; robot retreated.
